warning.fuzzer_erased: This fuzzer and all its versions will be deleted permanently without recovery options.
warning.version_erased: This version will be deleted permanently without recovery options.
warning.project_erased: This project and all its fuzzers, versions and all related settings will be deleted permanently without recovery options.
warning.integration_erased: This integration and all its settings will be deleted permanently without recovery options.
warning.user_bin_empty: All projects,theirs fuzzers, versions that are already in trash, and all related settings will be deleted permanently without recovery options.
warning.project_bin_empty: Fuzzers and versions of the current Project that are already in trash will be deleted permanently without recovery options.
warning.fuzzer_cleanup_with_fuzzer: This fuzzer and all its versions will be deleted permanently without recovery options.
warning.fuzzer_cleanup_without_fuzzer: Fuzzer versions that were already in trash will be deleted permanently without recovery options.
